5#include "include/cppgc/testing.h"
6
7#include "src/base/logging.h"
8#include "src/heap/cppgc/heap-base.h"
9
10namespace cppgc {
11namespace testing {
12
13OverrideEmbedderStackStateScope::OverrideEmbedderStackStateScope(
14 HeapHandle& heap_handle, EmbedderStackState state)
15 : heap_handle_(heap_handle) {
16 internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle_).set_override_stack_state(state);
17}
18
19OverrideEmbedderStackStateScope::~OverrideEmbedderStackStateScope() {
20 internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle_).clear_overridden_stack_state();
21}
22
23StandaloneTestingHeap::StandaloneTestingHeap(HeapHandle& heap_handle)
24 : heap_handle_(heap_handle) {}
25
26void StandaloneTestingHeap::StartGarbageCollection() {
27 internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle_)
28 .StartIncrementalGarbageCollectionForTesting();
29}
30
31bool StandaloneTestingHeap::PerformMarkingStep(EmbedderStackState stack_state) {
32 return internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle_)
33 .marker()
34 ->IncrementalMarkingStepForTesting(stack_state);
35}
36
37void StandaloneTestingHeap::FinalizeGarbageCollection(
38 EmbedderStackState stack_state) {
39 internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle_)
40 .FinalizeIncrementalGarbageCollectionForTesting(stack_state);
41}
42
43void StandaloneTestingHeap::ToggleMainThreadMarking(bool should_mark) {
44 internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle_)
45 .marker()
46 ->SetMainThreadMarkingDisabledForTesting(!should_mark);
47}
48
49void StandaloneTestingHeap::ForceCompactionForNextGarbageCollection() {
50 internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle_)
51 .compactor()
52 .EnableForNextGCForTesting();
53}
54
55bool IsHeapObjectOld(void* object) {
56#if defined(CPPGC_YOUNG_GENERATION)
57 return internal::HeapObjectHeader::FromObject(object).IsMarked();
58#else
59 return true;
60#endif
61}
62
63} // namespace testing
64} // namespace cppgc
